snippet.title: Marvel's Midnight Suns - 'The Awakening' | Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
When Hell awakens, only they can stop it. Rise up and join a darker order of heroes to defeat Lilith before the Darkhold is complete in this tactical RPG set in the darker side of the Marvel Universe.

#DarknessFalls when Marvel's Midnight Suns arrives March 2022.

Song: 'Enter Sandman' by Alessia Cara & The Warning from The Metallica Blacklist

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/midnightsuns
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/midnightsuns
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/midnightsuns
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/midnightsuns
